alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:23PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Seminole, northwestern Brevard and southeastern Volusia Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 222 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maytown, or 10 miles southwest of Edgewater. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oak Hill, Scottsmoor, Geneva, Mims, and Maytown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. On rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
